newsitem.title: HUNGARY: HUNGARY O/N RATES END STEADY AT 19.625 PCT.
newsitem.headline: HUNGARY O/N RATES END STEADY AT 19.625 PCT.

text.p: Hungary's overnight interest rates were steady on Thursday in a liquid market and moderate activity, dealers said.
Overnight rates traded between 19.625 and 19.875 percent , with most deals struck at 19.75 percent, and finished at 19.625 percent, unchanged from Wednesday.
Since the beginning of the banks' two-week reserve period on August 1, overnight rates have hovered in a narrow range between 19.50 and 20.00 percent.
